# Logger.Log method

Logs a message with the specified message type.

```csharp
private void Log(string message, string messageType)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| message | The message to log. |
| messageType | The type of message (e.g., "INFO", "WARNING", "ERROR"). |
